beer.beer_description: Our 2025 Single Hop Series has been designed to exhibit the full sensory spectrum of the hops we hand selected at Indie Hops HQ Oregon, across a range of beer styles. This is Strata, a 100% Strata hopped Oat Cream IPA.

items.badge_description: It's New Brew Thursday! Drink any beer you have never had before on three different Thursdays in a 20 day period.

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 380 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 77! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.checkin_comment: Another great one, peachy, Apricot, smooth 100% Strata.

user.bio: Beer and fire. I'm a considerate anarchist.

items.checkin_comment: Happy Fathers Day to me. What better to have after a game of golf. Strata reaching great heights. Hazy stonefruit and citrus juiciness.

items.badge_description: You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 415 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 84!

items.checkin_comment: This brew really showcases the brilliance of strata hops. Creamy and soft with stone fruit notes followed by a nice bitter finish

beer.beer_description: Our 2025 Single Hop Series has been designed to exhibit the full sensory spectrum of the hops we hand selected at Indie Hops HQ Oregon, across a range of beer styles. This is Strata, a 100% Strata hopped Oat Cream IPA.

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 70 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 15!

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 60 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 13!

items.checkin_comment: Creamy coconut, citrus, not much weed. Good hop but Ive had better examples.

user.bio: Started as a hobby, took it a bit too far. In Singapore, on the hunt for those lovely drops.

items.badge_description:
The beer style with the most annual check-ins definitely deserves its own party, dont you think?

In 2023, Sierra Nevada had the brilliant idea to create a day of celebration for hazies, and we gotta tip our cap to their brilliant idea! 

This year, were excited to introduce our second iteration of the Hazy IPA Day badge.
